dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: Potassium chloride is a chemical compound used primarily in agriculture as a fertilizer. Its processing level is generally refined or granulated. It is known for its technical aspects such as being a readily soluble source of potassium for plants. The product can be treatment-free or undergo various treatments such as anti-caking. It meets the standard compliance for fertilizers, ensures quality for agriculture use, has usage information mainly in the agriculture sector, and is produced mainly through the evaporation of brine or mineral ore processing. Its educt, or raw material, is typically sylvite or brine deposits. Potassium chloride can be found as part of a production mix at the plant or as a consumption mix when available 'to consumer'. Overall, it is marked by its high purity and availability 'at plant' for direct use or distribution.

氯化钾是一种主要用于农业的化肥，其处理等级通常为精制或制成颗粒状。它是植物可立即吸收钾的溶解性来源，知名的技术特性包括可能的无需处理或可以经过各种处理，如防结块处理。它符合化肥标准，确保用于农业的质量，并且主要用途信息为农业领域，通常是通过盐卤水蒸发或矿石加工生产的。其原材料通常是硅藻土或卤水沉积物。氯化钾可能是植物内生产组合的一部分，或者在为消费者提供时成为消费组合。总的来说，它因其高纯度和可直接使用或分发的“工厂现场”可用性而闻名。
